title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Full QC check and service undergone prior to delivery.Packaging: All bikes are securely boxed and packaged to avoid any damages in transit.Race Ready: Bikes are delivered “race ready” meaning you simply have to fit the front wheel, seat post and pedals and there you go – Riding!Trading hours: Monday to Friday 08h00 – 18h00 Saturday 08h00 to 14h00 Contact us: Tel: (021) 556 8207 or hanber@cycleteknix.co.za or WhatsApp 084 550 1353Address: 145 Blaauwberg Road, Table View, Cape Town, 7441.Website: View our website for more great specials: www.cycleteknix.co.zaItems Available: 1Address: 145 Blaauwberg Rd, Table View, Cape Town, 7441

title: ADO A20F XE Fat Tire E-bike - 250W Foldable
text:
ADO 20F XE electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system - The latest XE model
Shimano 7-speed TransmissionADO 20F XE  electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system, it can effectively solve the problems customers encounter on hills, snow and other difficult roads. Give customers a smooth sporting experience!
Front fork suspension to overcome rough and bumpy road conditions The front fork is with spring absorber ,which effectively absorbs the ground impact and brings sensitive response and smooth operation to the rider.
20X4.0 Fat TyreFolding electric bike looks much like any other foldable mountain bike, but with some extra style and those 20×4.0 CST fat tires have an attitude.
It combines the best of both foldable bikes and mountain bikes you can get.
Overall size : 1740*530*1200 mm
After folding: 980*450*770 mm
Net Weight: 30kgG-Driver 2.0 Control SystemADO’s updated G-Driver controller is the solution to gear automation. It offers excellent real-time performance and responds seamlessly to user input.


250w Powerful MotorThis 20-inch fat-tire electric bike packs some awesome power in the form of a massive 250-watt rear hub motor that works with a 36V 10.4Ah battery for a maximum speed of 25 miles per hour. The high-speed motor allows you to cross any terrain with ease.

title: Titan Drone Elite (L) ~ Very Reliable
text:
The Titan drone elite is an entry level hard tail mountain bike with very playful dimensions. It's midrange Shimano drivetrain and Rockshox fork is pretty much unbreakable if looked after. The rest of the bike is reassuringly simplistic, making it a tough, no nonsense work horse ready to take a beating. I've personally dragged one of these through hell and back, way beyond it's design brief. Race after race it kept going, whilst my teem's high end racers required very expensive rebuilds.

If you're looking to get into mountain biking, get your son into mountain biking, or perhaps you're too sorry to drag you carbon race machine through the mud in an adventure race, this bike is a very good option to consider.

The bike includes a Rockshox lockout lever and frame protection stickers. The bike has done very little miles and has no wear, considered new.

Contact 0766679959

title: Specialized Camber FSR MTB 29er Large
text:
Specialized Camber FSR MTB 29er
Frameset
• Frame-M5 alloy, Trail 29 Geometry, PF30 BB, 142mm dropouts, internal shift cable routing, w/ Taco Blade, 120mm travel
• ForkRockShox Revelation RC3 29, Solo Air spring, 120mm travel, 3-position compression adjust, rebound adjust, tapered steerer, 46mm offset, 15mm Maxle Lite thru-axle
• Shock
FOX Float Performance DPS, AUTOSAG, 205x53mm
Wheels
• Hubs-Front: Specialized, Hi Lo disc, sealed cartridge bearings, 15mm thru-axle, 24h
Rear: Specialized disc, alloy, sealed cartridge bearings,12x142mm thru-axle, 32h
• Wheels-Roval Traverse 29, hookless alloy, 29mm inner width, 24/28h, tubeless ready
• Spokes-DT Swiss Industry, stainless
Drivetrain
• Chain-SRAM PC-1031, 12-speed, w/ PowerLink, nickel finish
• Crank-Custom SRAM S-1250, 7050 alloy arms, PF30, 34/22T, 104/64mm BCD spider
• Bottom Bracket-SRAM PF30, OS press-in bearings
• Front Derailleur-SRAM X7, mid direct mount, w/ Taco Blade
• Rear Derailleur-SRAM NX ,12-speed, mid cage
• Shifters-SRAM, w/ Matchmaker clamp
Components
• Brakeset-Front: Shimano Deore BR-M506, hydraulic disc, dual piston, resin pads, S/M: 180mm rotor, L/XL: 200mm rotor
• Rear: Shimano Deore BR-M506, hydraulic disc, dual piston, resin pads, S/M: 160mm rotor, L/XL: 180mm rotor
• Handlebar-Specialized Mini-rise, 6000 alloy, 8-backsweep, 6-upsweep, 10mm rise, 720mm width, 31.8mm clamp
• Saddle-Body Geometry Henge Comp, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
• Seatpost-Giant Dropper post, alloy, single bolt, 30.9mm, a new under bar lever is included
• Stem- Specialized Trail, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt, 6-degree rise
New FastTrack rear tyre 90%
Front tyre 50%
New rear brake pads
Front pads 50%
Specialized Camber Comp 29 is an Trail mountain bike. It has RockShox suspension and a SRAM drivetrain. 
Fast 29-inch rolling stock, this Camber is designed for speed over the entire trail.
In other words, it blends all of the trail bike characteristics that you want with the XC climbing prowess that you need. 
This is achieved by thoughtfully combining our M5 alloy Trail Chassis with a Camber FSR rear end.
The combination results in blending lightweight, rigidity, and durability in one package. At both ends of the bike, you’ll find sufficient travel lengths that deliver plenty of plush suspension—all without going overboard on big hit capability. This means that you don’t have to sacrifice efficiency, weight, or sheer speed to ride how you want. 
Stiff lightweight Trail 29 Geometry
Smooth Concentric Pivot at the rear Components that focus on strength and performance, like a custom SRAM double-ring crankset, powerful Shimano hydraulic disc brakes
Hand-built Roval wheels
location: Flamingo Vlei, West Coast, Western Cape

title: Ride along bike seat
text:
Classic, safe and
easy-to-use reclining child bike seat, taking your daily commutes and family
bike adventures to the next level.

With
Thule RideAlong child bike seat, it’s easier than ever to bring the kids along
for a bike ride. The seat’s quick-release bracket makes it super-easy and quick
to install. The bracket is mounted with bolts from the front, where there’s
free space to use a tool. Once the bracket is mounted, the seat clicks into
position and is ready for use in seconds. The child bike seat also has a
reclining function for extra comfort and on-the-go naps.

title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

title: ZERO 8X Compact Dual Suspension Dual Motor E-Scooter
text:
The ZERO 8X is a powerful, dual suspension, dual drive electric scooter that can reach a speed of 50 km/hwith a range of 80 km on one charge.
The 8 x 3.5 inch tires are honeycombed solid tires which does not require any air inflation (hence no risk of punctures) but yet achieves a nice comfortable bounce similar to air/pneumatic tires.
Equipped with 2 front and 2 rear LED lights with under chassis lights, the ZERO 8X has a flood of lights that makes night riding safe and visible.
The scooter was purchased in March this year and literally been used very seldom and is practically in a brand new condition.
Comes with the original box, charger and accessories.
Please feel free to contact me if interested. The price is not negotiable. For more details follow the link below.
https://youtu.be/M7R3Ru0VtBs
